components.data: Place the grid on drops of uranyl acetate and incubate for 15 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place the grid on drops of uranyl acetate and incubate for 15 minutes.

components.data: Rinse the grind in water several times.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Rinse the grind in water several times.

components.data: Place the grid on drops of lead citrate and incubate for 4 minutes. In order to avoid precipitation of lead citrate by exposure to carbon dioxide, add pellets of sodium hydroxide in the dish where incubation takes place.
components.name: Description
